summary.Title: Employees for Matas’ webshop in Humlebæk
summary.JobHeadline: Employees for Matas’ webshop in Humlebæk
summary.Presentation:
nr. 170173
Are you looking for an active job? And do you want to become part of a joyful team? If so, read on.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Employees for Matas’ webshop in Humlebæk
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
nr. 170173

Are you looking for an active job? And do you want to become part of a joyful team? If so, read on.

 

We offer

At Matas webshop, you will be a part of a young and energetic team where there is an efficient and social environment.

 

Your primary tasks will be picking and packing orders for Matas’ eCommerce customers all over the country. It will therefore be your responsibility to collect the right goods and products from the shelves and make sure that they are shipped properly. There will be a thorough onboarding of their systems and tasks.

 

We are looking for committed employees who are interested in working part-time. Depending on your flexibility, effort, and especially in peak seasons full-time will also be a possibility.

Working hours are between 07.00 - 21.00 Monday to Friday and from 8.00 - 16.00 Saturday and Sunday. Each week you enter which days and periods you wish to work in our My Job app. Please note that your shift wishes must be a minimum of four hours. Your shifts will in some periods be a mix of on-call shifts and actual shifts.

 

Who are you?

If you are the right candidate for this position, you have an excellent sense of order and you complete your tasks thoroughly. You like doing the same routines repeatedly and maybe you even find satisfaction in optimizing your routine to be faster and better. You understand the importance of stability and you can keep your head cool – especially in peaks seasons where the pace is high. You like teamwork but working independently is no problem either.

 

Practical information

There is a continuous start-up. To be taken into consideration for this position you must be able to work a minimum of two times per week and you can see yourself working here for a longer period.

 

Transport:

Before you apply for the job, we recommend you check how to commute to the Webshop as it is placed 3,5 kilometers from Humlebæk Station. There are a few bus connections to the address but other than that the transport opportunities are limited.

 

Salary:

The hourly salary is 123,92 dkkr with additional pay after 6 pm., on Sundays, and during holidays. In addition to the base salary, there is 7 % in ‘Fritvalgs Lønkonto’ and 8% in pensions.

We are looking forward to receive your application following the link below.
